casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Orlando R. CLARK. No. 383P04-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2006. William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Edward W. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of March 2006 by Defendant to Proceed as Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of April 2006."
